title: Danillo Arigoni
text:
I am currently an Artificial Intelligence Researcher at Alfaneo and a PhD student in Computer Science at the School of Computing (FACOM), the Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul (UFMS), advised by Prof. Renato Porfirio Ishii.


Ph.D. in Computer Science  School of Computing (FACOM), Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul (UFMS)  Advisors: Prof. Renato Porfirio Ishii  March 2023 - Present
M.Sc. in Computer Science School of Computing (FACOM), Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul (UFMS) Advisors: Prof. Ricardo Ribeiro dos Santos and Prof. Liana D. Duenha Garanhani March 2020 - July 2022
Bs. in Computer Engineering School of Computing (FACOM), Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul (UFMS) 2013 - 2018




Alfaneo | Artificial Intelligence Researcher | December 2022 - present

NLP, outlier detection in sentence set, automatic sentence labeling (zero-shot, few-shot)
Online Anomalous Trajectory/Subtrajectory Detection.
Text generation for lawyers with LLM.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
